Appartamento carino, mobili moderni e solarium piacevole. Peccato le pulizie che in 3 notti hanno solo rifatto il letto e pulito 1 volta. Asciugamani cambiati 1 volta e di 4 solo 3. Carini e disponibili il personale della reception e la signora delle colazioni.
I booked through a reservation site and selected this place because it had a free cancelation policy up to 24 hours before arrival. Turns out the whole reservation process is handled by a third party business which had a different policy, and the reservation site did not state any of this. This caused some mayor issues 24 hours prior to our arrival that was fortunately solved, but did nevertheless cause a slight heart attack.   Once you arrive, the check-in has to be done online on your own device, instead of personally, the people at the desk only tell you what to do, but  cannot do the check-in themselves. There si no information of this prior to your arrival, so beware.   Rooms are quiet as they face an inner courtyard, but if you're more than 2 in a room, beware there are no doors between the sleeping room and sitting room, no privacy at all. It didn't help avoid me hearing the snoring of my friend, and thus catching any sleep at all! On the plus side, there is a capsule coffe machine, and full Andlausian breakfast waiting in the fridge with fresh bread being delivered every morning. Would only go there again if I were to stay in one of the top floor apartments with a terrace!‚Ä¶

Si es posible que no os den la habitaci√≥n que da a la escalera que el ba√±o es m√°s peque√±o y la cocina tambi√©n.

I booked through a reservation site and selected this place because it had a free cancelation policy up to 24 hours before arrival. Turns out the whole reservation process is handled by a third party business which had a different policy, and the reservation site did not state any of this. This caused some mayor issues 24 hours prior to our arrival that was fortunately solved, but did nevertheless cause a slight heart attack.   Once you arrive, the check-in has to be done online on your own device, instead of personally, the people at the desk only tell you what to do, but  cannot do the check-in themselves. There si no information of this prior to your arrival, so beware.   Rooms are quiet as they face an inner courtyard, but if you're more than 2 in a room, beware there are no doors between the sleeping room and sitting room, no privacy at all. It didn't help avoid me hearing the snoring of my friend, and thus catching any sleep at all! On the plus side, there is a capsule coffe machine, and full Andlausian breakfast waiting in the fridge with fresh bread being delivered every morning. Would only go there again if I were to stay in one of the top floor apartments with a terrace!‚Ä¶

All new and squeaky clean. Got upgraded to a room with a view. Soundproofing is very good so little/no traffic noise. Unfortunately we had booked bed and breakfast. On arrival we had a choice of 3 breakfast times. I thought this was for Covid reasons but it isn't. It's because the breakfast room is tiny with only 9 tables so they have to stagger arrivals. Didn't like having to set my alarm for breakfast time when I'm on holiday. Also no outlook so much nicer to eat in a cafe in the old town just across the road. No phone in the room. Laptop provided but I was unable to change the language so couldn't use it. When we were troubled by noisy neighbours, reception said we could call them by laptop an dexplained how to do this. Having recently returned from a holiday at Adventure Velez near a lovely town called Velez Rubio I feel I have to let people know this is one to give a MISS. We spent between us including flights and car hire ¬£1,520 for three people for 1 week and the atmosphere was unbearable. We had no television no phone no air conditioning with temperatures exceeding 35 degrees. The owners told us we had been given an upgrade because we were the only people there. We never had a change of bedding and we had 1  towel change. There was zero customer service, the food was minimal and no choice of menu. The best meal we had was when some locals visited for a meal and they raised the standard. So for the 18 euros we paid for an evening meal this was the only night it was worth it having been told by locals that we could have a 3 course meal at a top Hotel for 15 euros we feel again this was over the top. Exploring the area was eceptional having visited some beautiful part of Almeria this was down to my own knowledge of the area and locals advise.‚Ä¶

My friend and I stayed at Mi Luna for one night.  To spite the description, the place was very dirty; many things did not work; and there were a total of 16 people squeezed into an approximately 800 foot place.  While there, we were asked to continuously whisper, as their yoga studio was above and beyond their priority over their massive amount of guests.  In the morning, my friend and I were talking in our room at a normal volume, when the half-naked male host barged into our female room without being invited!  He proceeded to yell at us about how we were not being quiet enough.  When we pointed out that we felt unsafe and unwelcomed, the man picked up our belongings and demanded that we leave!

Arroyo Frio is located in the heart of the biggest Spain's natural protected zone. You could expect a place like a quiet mountain resort, you are completely wrong. You will find a crowded, noisy and chaotic cheap beach camp, a pity. Avoid this place and enjoy the surroundings and the landscape.

Estuvimos una familia en semana santa 2009 (solo 3 dias). Nos cobraron 80 euros por noche. Esperabamos otra cosa. El apartamento muy usado y frio. Para calentarlo solo hay dos peque√±os radiadores electricos que no alcanzan a caldear el ambiente. Si usas la chimenea dicen que son 10 euros mas (que nosotros no quisimos pagar). Las camas viejas y el mobiliario tambien. Sensacion de abandono. Limpieza deficiente. Suelos sin barrer. Las sabanas, aunque limpias, hacia tiempo que no se cambiaban y habia bichos muertos en ellas (mosquitos, ara√±as). El menaje muy escaso, con alguna olla, sarten, platos, vasos y cubiertos, nada mas. Nevera peque√±a. No hay microondas. En la encimera solo hay dos placas electricas peque√±as. El lugar es bonito y esta en una loma (la sierra atras y abajo los olivares), pero para llegar con el coche hay que subir rampas de tierra estrechas y empinadas. Poco acondicionado el acceso. En definitina, muy caro para su pobre calidad. Por este mismo precio hay casas rurales muy cuidadas. Fuimos a este lugar porque decidimos a ultima hora y ya no habia plazas libres en la zona. Al pagar no nos dieron factura (se supone que 80 euros eran sin iva). Muy mal hecho por nuestra parte. Nos quedo la impresion de que van a sacar dinero facil haciendo el minimo gasto. De ahi el mal estado general de los adosados, con grietas y minimo mantenimiento.‚Ä¶

Incre√≠ble que lo gestione BOOKING.com, ya que es viejo, fatal mantenido (sera de los 70 y desde que sali√≥ el √∫ltimo alba√±il entonces no se ha hecho nada), peor equipado, inc√≥modo, y sin lo m√°s b√°sico para alquilar. Os digo: Olor a bajantes; cerraduras que se atrancan; agua que se corta en medio de la ducha; un plato de ducha liliputiense y el agua sale hacia el water; cristales rotos; toldos de terraza no usable por oxidados y viejos -da miedo tocarlos-; colchones incomodisimos con muelles salidos; muebles viejisimos y escasos; y limpieza lo m√≠nimo -los cristaleras del sal√≥n de casco, con manchas-; y largo etc.  De ah√≠ que no mandaran fotos aunque se le pidieron varias veces, y que cobren por anticipado (echales un galgo...). HA SIDO UN TIMO Y LO ADVIERTO PARA QUE NADIE MAS CAIGA.  Es Impresentable que ofrezcan un alquiler as√≠, por no calificarlo de sinvergonzoneria. Esto no es un apartamento es un antro. Antiguo, sucio, maloliente. Lleno de desperfectos y malos olores. La limpieza inexistente, encimeras pegajosas, pelos por todas partes, suelo sucio. Para ser un hotel del 4 estrellas, deja bastante que desear. Intentare resumirlo en puntos positivos y negativos. NO LO RECOMIENDO.

Pesimo para ser un 4 estrellas, es horrible la espera que hay que hacer para coger un ascensor y para entrar al comedor.
